# 0 - default - take name from the ruling party list
# 1 - RDC Republican
# 2 - RDC Democrat
# 3 - NPP Left
# 4 - NPP Center
# 5 - NPP Right (Yockey)
# 6 - NPP Far Right

#initialize_US_elections_system scripted effect automatically generated by Yard1's TNO US Elections generator script
initialize_US_elections_system = {
	
	every_owned_state = {
		limit = { can_have_elections_in_state = yes }
		clamp_variable = { #make sure to clamp any support variable that can change!
			var = RD_popularity
			min = 0.001
			max = 1000
		}
		clamp_variable = { #make sure to clamp any support variable that can change!
			var = NPP_popularity
			min = 0.001
			max = 1000
		}
	}
	
	#no bonus popularity unless stated
	USA = {
		set_variable = { DEM_civil_rights_opinion = 7 }
		set_variable = { DEM_domestic_policy_opinion = 6 }
		set_variable = { DEM_economic_policy_opinion = 7 }
		set_variable = { DEM_foreign_policy_opinion = 8 }
		
		set_variable = { SOUTHERN_DEM_civil_rights_opinion = 4 }
		set_variable = { SOUTHERN_DEM_domestic_policy_opinion = 4 }
		set_variable = { SOUTHERN_DEM_economic_policy_opinion = 5 }
		set_variable = { SOUTHERN_DEM_foreign_policy_opinion = 8 }
		
		set_variable = { REP_civil_rights_opinion = 5 }
		set_variable = { REP_domestic_policy_opinion = 6 }
		set_variable = { REP_economic_policy_opinion = 4 }
		set_variable = { REP_foreign_policy_opinion = 6 }
		
		set_variable = { PRO_civil_rights_opinion = 8 }
		set_variable = { PRO_domestic_policy_opinion = 8 }
		set_variable = { PRO_economic_policy_opinion = 4 }
		set_variable = { PRO_foreign_policy_opinion = 5 }
		
		set_variable = { NAT_civil_rights_opinion = 2 }
		set_variable = { NAT_domestic_policy_opinion = 3 }
		set_variable = { NAT_economic_policy_opinion = 3 }
		set_variable = { NAT_foreign_policy_opinion = 3 }
		
		set_variable = { COM_civil_rights_opinion = 10 }
		set_variable = { COM_domestic_policy_opinion = 10 }
		set_variable = { COM_economic_policy_opinion = 10 }
		set_variable = { COM_foreign_policy_opinion = 3 }
		
		set_variable = { ANV_civil_rights_opinion = 1 }
		set_variable = { ANV_domestic_policy_opinion = 1 }
		set_variable = { ANV_economic_policy_opinion = 1 }
		set_variable = { ANV_foreign_policy_opinion = 1 }
	
		set_variable = { USA_civil_rights_importance = 0.8 }
		set_variable = { USA_domestic_policy_importance = 0.45 }
		set_variable = { USA_economic_policy_importance = 0.6 }
		set_variable = { USA_foreign_policy_importance = 0.55 }
		# soft cap, 60%
		
		set_variable = { black_rep_affiliation = .20 }
		set_variable = { black_dem_affiliation = .63 }
		set_variable = { black_pro_affiliation = .27 }
		set_variable = { black_nat_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { black_com_affiliation = .01 }
		set_variable = { black_anv_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { black_civil_rights_opinion = 8 }
		set_variable = { black_domestic_policy_opinion = 5 }
		set_variable = { black_economic_policy_opinion = 7 }
		set_variable = { black_foreign_policy_opinion = 5 }
				
		set_variable = { hispanic_rep_affiliation = .20 }
		set_variable = { hispanic_dem_affiliation = .67 }
		set_variable = { hispanic_pro_affiliation = .24 }
		set_variable = { hispanic_nat_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { hispanic_com_affiliation = .01 }
		set_variable = { hispanic_anv_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { hispanic_civil_rights_opinion = 8 }
		set_variable = { hispanic_domestic_policy_opinion = 4 }
		set_variable = { hispanic_economic_policy_opinion = 7 }
		set_variable = { hispanic_foreign_policy_opinion = 5 }
				
		set_variable = { minority_rep_affiliation = .27 }
		set_variable = { minority_dem_affiliation = .73 }
		set_variable = { minority_pro_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { minority_nat_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { minority_com_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { minority_anv_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { minority_civil_rights_opinion = 8 }
		set_variable = { minority_domestic_policy_opinion = 5 }
		set_variable = { minority_economic_policy_opinion = 7 }
		set_variable = { minority_foreign_policy_opinion = 5 }
				
		set_variable = { nativists_rep_affiliation = .06 }
		set_variable = { nativists_dem_affiliation = .2 }
		set_variable = { nativists_pro_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { nativists_nat_affiliation = .74 }
		set_variable = { nativists_com_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { nativists_anv_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { nativists_civil_rights_opinion = 3 }
		set_variable = { nativists_domestic_policy_opinion = 2 }
		set_variable = { nativists_economic_policy_opinion = 3 }
		set_variable = { nativists_foreign_policy_opinion = 3 }
				
		set_variable = { urban_rep_affiliation = .34 }
		set_variable = { urban_dem_affiliation = .26 }
		set_variable = { urban_pro_affiliation = .25 }
		set_variable = { urban_nat_affiliation = .15 }
		set_variable = { urban_com_affiliation = .0 } 
		set_variable = { urban_anv_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { urban_civil_rights_opinion = 8 }
		set_variable = { urban_domestic_policy_opinion = 7 }
		set_variable = { urban_economic_policy_opinion = 6 }
		set_variable = { urban_foreign_policy_opinion = 8 }
				
		set_variable = { rural_rep_affiliation = .33 }
		set_variable = { rural_dem_affiliation = .23 }
		set_variable = { rural_pro_affiliation = .14 }
		set_variable = { rural_nat_affiliation = .30 }
		set_variable = { rural_com_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { rural_anv_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { rural_civil_rights_opinion = 5 }
		set_variable = { rural_domestic_policy_opinion = 3 }
		set_variable = { rural_economic_policy_opinion = 6 }
		set_variable = { rural_foreign_policy_opinion = 4 }
				
		set_variable = { union_rep_affiliation = .08 }
		set_variable = { union_dem_affiliation = .6 }
		set_variable = { union_pro_affiliation = .28 }
		set_variable = { union_nat_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { union_com_affiliation = .04 }
		set_variable = { union_anv_affiliation = .0 }
		set_variable = { union_civil_rights_opinion = 7 }
		set_variable = { union_domestic_policy_opinion = 8 }
		set_variable = { union_economic_policy_opinion = 10 }
		set_variable = { union_foreign_policy_opinion = 7 }
		
		set_variable = { black_turnout = .31 }
		set_variable = { hispanic_turnout = .27 }
		set_variable = { minority_turnout = .24 }
		set_variable = { nativists_turnout = .43 }
		set_variable = { urban_turnout = .37 }
		set_variable = { rural_turnout = .63 }
		set_variable = { union_turnout = .64 }
	
		set_variable = { NPP_electoral_votes = 0 }
		set_variable = { RD_electoral_votes = 0 }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { can_have_elections_in_state = yes }
			set_variable = { rdc_votes_sen = 0 }
			set_variable = { npp_votes_sen = 0 }
			set_variable = { rdc_votes = 0 }
			set_variable = { npp_votes = 0 }
		}
		USA_update_policy_opinions = yes
	}
	367 = { # Alabama, extremely pro-segregation
		set_state_flag = USA_senate_class_23
		set_state_flag = US_election_state
		set_variable = { RD_popularity = 0.2 } # Default Value
		set_variable = { NPP_popularity = 0.8 } # Default Value
		set_variable = { senator_1 = 6 } #Lurleen Wallace
		set_variable = { senator_2 = 6 } #John Sparkman
		set_variable = { electoral_votes = 10 }
		
		set_state_flag = state_group_k
		set_state_flag = state_group_k1
		set_variable = { voter_role = 196.0044 }
				
		set_variable = { black_pop = .14 }
		set_variable = { hispanic_pop = .04 }
		set_variable = { minority_pop = .01 }
		set_variable = { nativists_pop = .51 }
		set_variable = { urban_pop = .21 }
		set_variable = { rural_pop = .08 }
		set_variable = { union_pop = .02 }
	}
	463 = { # Alaska, tends to be conservative due to petroleum industry, and a decent amount of NPP support because of Japanophobia
		set_state_flag = US_election_state
		set_state_flag = USA_senate_class_23
		set_variable = { RD_popularity = 0.6 } # Default Value
		set_variable = { NPP_popularity = 0.4 } # Default Value
		set_variable = { senator_1 = 4 } #Keith Harvey Miller
		set_variable = { senator_2 = 6 } #Ernest Gruening
		set_variable = { electoral_votes = 3 }
		
		set_state_flag = state_group_aa
		set_variable = { voter_role = 13.4254 }
				
		set_variable = { black_pop = .03 }
		set_variable = { hispanic_pop = .02 }
		set_variable = { minority_pop = .09 }
		set_variable = { nativists_pop = .01 }
		set_variable = { urban_pop = .291 }
		set_variable = { rural_pop = .451 }
		set_variable = { union_pop = .108 }
	}
	377 = { # Arizona,  fairly conservative, but most people wouldn't have a reason to join the NPP except members of the Chicano movement
		set_state_flag = US_election_state
		set_state_flag = USA_senate_class_13
		set_variable = { RD_popularity = 0.8 } # Default Value
		set_variable = { NPP_popularity = 0.2 } # Default Value
		set_variable = { senator_1 = 1 } #Barry Goldwater
		set_variable = { senator_2 = 2 } #Carl Hayden
		set_variable = { electoral_votes = 5 }
		
		set_state_flag = state_group_e
		set_variable = { voter_role = 31.4590 }
				
		set_variable = { black_pop = .033 }
		set_variable = { hispanic_pop = .111 }
		set_variable = { minority_pop = .167 }
		set_variable = { nativists_pop = .005 }
		set_variable = { urban_pop = .417 }
		set_variable = { rural_pop = .2 }
		set_variable = { union_pop = .067 }
	}
	372 = { # Arkansas, FR-NPP is probably growing in strength here but there's
		set_state_flag = US_election_state

	}
	378 = { # California, solidly Republican but also a significant NPP presence

	629 = { # Hawaii, honestly this place is probably gonna be divided by whoever liberates the islands. Give them a boost here when they get the islands back. Dems are probably dead in the water here though

		set_variable = { senator_2 = 0 } # EMPTY

	371 = { # Louisiana, pro segregation, NPP has made some inroads
		set_state_flag = US_election_state
		set_state_flag = USA_senate_class_23
		set_variable = { RD_popularity = 0.6 } # Default Value

		set_variable = { RD_popularity = 0.6 } # Default Value
		set_variable = { NPP_popularity = 0.4 } # Default Value
		set_variable = { senator_1 = 1 } #
		set_variable = { senator_2 = 1 } #
		set_variable = { electoral_votes = 3 }
		
		set_state_flag = state_group_x
		set_variable = { voter_role = 20.3855 }
				
		set_variable = { black_pop = .002 }
		set_variable = { hispanic_pop = .004 }
		set_variable = { minority_pop = .001 }
		set_variable = { nativists_pop = .001 }

		set_variable = { union_pop = .09 }
	}

	389 = {

		set_state_flag = USA_STATE_PARTY_C
	}	
	
	362 = {
		set_state_flag = USA_STATE_PARTY_SR
		set_state_flag = USA_STATE_PARTY_NSR
	}

		set_state_flag = USA_STATE_PARTY_SR
		set_state_flag = USA_STATE_PARTY_NSR
	}

	}

		set_state_flag = USA_STATE_PARTY_NSR
	}
	371 = {
		set_state_flag = USA_STATE_PARTY_LP
	}

	# This is here to prevent startup errors
	set_variable = { rep_results_pct = 0 }
	set_variable = { dem_results_pct = 0 }
	set_variable = { pro_results_pct = 0 }
	set_variable = { nat_results_pct = 0 }
	set_variable = { anv_results_pct = 0 }
	set_variable = { com_results_pct = 0 }
	
	initialize_US_elections_system_voter_turnout = yes
	
	set_variable = { USA_HR_Coalition_Sup = .35 } # protects from nationalist NPP
	set_variable = { USA_RR_Coalition_Sup = .50 } # because allowed nixon
	set_variable = { USA_LD_Coalition_Sup = .45 } # advances civil rights
	set_variable = { USA_DC_Coalition_Sup = .35 } # grrr civil rights
	USA_assess_RDC_health_and_unity = yes
	
	set_variable = { NPP_P_Leadership_Approval = .86 } # 
	set_variable = { NPP_N_Leadership_Approval = .93 } # 
	set_variable = { NPP_M_Leadership_Approval = .70 } # Only appear after 1966
	set_variable = { NPP_S_Leadership_Approval = .70 } # Only appear after 1966
	set_variable = { NPP_P_Coalition_Voting = .60 } # Vars only used for a single tooltip and previously one bill
	set_variable = { NPP_N_Coalition_Voting = .90 } # 
	set_variable = { NPP_M_Coalition_Voting = .20 } # 
	set_variable = { NPP_S_Coalition_Voting = .20 } # 

	set_variable = { NPP_P_Leadership_Approval_Trend = -0.01 } # Same Decay overtime for all these, only in play for NPP presidents
	set_variable = { NPP_N_Leadership_Approval_Trend = -0.01 } # Only starts affecting approval when an NPP president is elected
	set_variable = { NPP_M_Leadership_Approval_Trend = -0.01 }
	set_variable = { NPP_S_Leadership_Approval_Trend = -0.01 }
	set_variable = { NPP_P_Coalition_Voting_Trend = -0.01 } # Not used at all
	set_variable = { NPP_N_Coalition_Voting_Trend = -0.01 }
	set_variable = { NPP_M_Coalition_Voting_Trend = -0.01 }
	set_variable = { NPP_S_Coalition_Voting_Trend = -0.01 }

	USA_assess_NPP_unity = yes
	
	USA_pie_chart_math = yes
	USA_pie_chart_math = yes
	USA_pie_chart_math = yes
	USA_pie_chart_math = yes # run it a 2nd time bc its screwy
}
